brief_summary.textblock:
Purpose: This study is a Randomized, Double Blind, Multi-center, Active Drug Controlled,
      Phase III Clinical Trial to Compare the Safety and Efficacy of DWP450 Versus Botox® in
      Treatment of Post Stroke Upper Limb(wrist, finger, elbow, thumb)Spasticity.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Randomized, Double Blind, Multi-center, Active Drug Controlled, Phase III Clinical Trial to Compare the Safety and Efficacy of DWP450 Versus Botox® in Treatment of Post Stroke Upper Limb Spasticity

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Male or female adult patients

          2. ≥ 6 weeks since the last stroke

        Exclusion Criteria:

        1.Patients with diagnosed neuromuscular disorders such as Lamber-Eaton syndrome,
        myasthenia gravis, or amyotrophic lateral sclerosis.

other_name: Botulinum toxin type A Drug: Botulinum toxin type A
Botulinum Toxin type A Drug: Botulinum Toxin type A (Botox®)

facility.name: SMG-SNU Boramae Medical Center, 41, Borame-Gill, Dong Gjak-Gu

oversight_info.authority: Korea: Ministry of Food and Drug Safety

primary_outcome.description: The change in MAS (Modified Ashworth Scale) grade from baseline at week 4 for wrist flexor muscle tone
primary_outcome.measure: The change in MAS(Modified Ashworth Scale)grade for Wrist flexor

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.
